issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Skip known nightly failures
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7034](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7034). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The failures are ticketed. There's no point in running them if we know they're failing. The patches that fix the builds can add them back to the nightly list.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7034?focusedCommentId=16964483) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5760
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5760>
